title: Countdown Timer
description: Use a while loop to count down from 5 to 1, then print 'Go!'.
instructions: Write a program using a while loop that counts down from 5 to 1 (printing each number), then prints 'Go!'.

hints.text: Loop while count > 0, decrement each iteration
Use count-- or count = count - 1 to decrement

commonMistakes.correction: Always modify the loop variable inside the loop

commonMistakes.mistake: Using for loop instead of while
commonMistakes.consequence: Works but doesn't practice while loops
